org.libex.hamcrest

Class IsOptional<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hamcrest.BaseMatcher<T>
      • org.hamcrest.TypeSafeMatcher<com.google.common.base.Optional<T>>
        • org.libex.hamcrest.IsOptional<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T -
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.hamcrest.Matcher<com.google.common.base.Optional<T>>, org.hamcrest.SelfDescribing

    @ParametersAreNonnullByDefault
@ThreadSafe
@Immutable
public class IsOptional<T>
extends org.hamcrest.TypeSafeMatcher<com.google.common.base.Optional<T>>
    Provides Matchers for Optional instances
    Author:
    John Butler

    • Method Detail

      • absent

        public static <T> IsOptional<T> absent()
        Returns:
        a Matcher that matches an Optional that is not present ( isPresent returns false

      • absent

        public static <T> IsOptional<T> absent(Class<T> type)
        NOTE: the parameter is ONLY used for providing a type-specific generic to remove compile-time warnings. It does not validate the type of the contained data at runtime as at runtime the Optional should not contain any data.
        Parameters:
        type -
        Returns:
        an Matcher that matches an Optional that is present (isPresent returns false)

      • present

        public static <T> IsOptional<T> present()
        Returns:
        a Matcher that matches an Optional that is present ( isPresent returns true

      • present

        public static <T> IsOptional<T> present(Class<T> type)
        NOTE: the parameter is ONLY used for providing a type-specific generic to remove compile-time warnings. It does not validate the type of the contained data at runtime. To do this use presentMatching(Matcher) passing the CoreMatchers.instanceOf matcher.
        Parameters:
        type -
        Returns:
        an Matcher that matches an Optional that is present (isPresent returns true)

      • presentContaining

        public static <T> IsOptional<T> presentContaining(T value)
        Parameters:
        value - the value to test for
        Returns:
        a Matcher that matches an Optional that is present and whose value is equal to the passed value

      • presentMatching

        public static <T> IsOptional<T> presentMatching(org.hamcrest.Matcher<T> matcher)
        Parameters:
        matcher - the matcher to use against the value contained in the Optional
        Returns:
        a Matcher that matches an Optional that is present and whose value matches the passed matcher

      • ofNullableValue

        public static <T> IsOptional<T> ofNullableValue(@Nullable
                                T value)
        Creates an absent or present IsOptional based on the null state of the passed value. If the value is null, an absent IsOptional is returned. If non-null, a present IsOptional matching the value is returned.
        Parameters:
        value - the value to test for
        Returns:
        an absent or present IsOptional based on the null state of the passed value
        See Also:
        absent(), presentContaining(Object)

      • matchesSafely

        public boolean matchesSafely(com.google.common.base.Optional<T> item)
        Specified by:
        matchesSafely in class org.hamcrest.TypeSafeMatcher<com.google.common.base.Optional<T>>

        public void describeTo(org.hamcrest.Description description)
